import PageTopBar from "@toptal/picasso/PageTopBar/PageTopBar"; import { Container, Section, Table, Typography } from "@toptal/picasso"; import { Code16 } from "@toptal/picasso/Icon"; import data from "./data"; function App() { return ( Heroes } />
Box 1 title } variant="bordered" > Hover over the icon for more info
Name Hero Cape Universe {data.map((row) => ( {row.name} {row.hero} {row.cape} {row.universe} ))} Total {data.length}
); } export default App;
